title: SPF - Download
head:
<link rel="stylesheet" name="roboto" href="//fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Roboto:300,600,900|Roboto+Condensed:300,300italic,400,700|Inconsolata:400">
<link rel="stylesheet" name="wsk" href="/spfjs/assets/vendor/wsk/0.4.0/styles/wsk.css">
<link rel="stylesheet" name="octicons" href="/spfjs/assets/vendor/octicons/2.1.2/octicons.css">
<link rel="stylesheet" name="main" href="/spfjs/assets/styles/main.css?t=2015-01-24T14%3A27%3A06-05%3A00">

body.content:
Download

Get the code.
SPF 21 (v2.1.1)

  • Download SPF
  • Download source
  • View on GitHub

Install with npm or Bower

Install the npm package:

npm install spf

Install the Bower package:

bower install spf

Link to a CDN

You can link to the JS files directly from several popular CDNs:

  • Google Hosted Libraries
    https://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/spf/2.1.1/spf.js
  • cdnjs
    https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/spf/2.1.1/spf.js
  • jsDelivr
    https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/spf/2.1.1/spf.js
  • OSSCDN
    https://oss.maxcdn.com/spf/2.1.1/spf.js

Download a release

Download just the minified JS files: spfjs-2.1.1-dist.zip

curl -LO https://github.com/youtube/spfjs/releases/download/v2.1.1/spfjs-2.1.1-dist.zip
unzip spfjs-2.1.1-dist.zip

Or, download the minified files and complete source code: v2.1.1.zip

curl -LO https://github.com/youtube/spfjs/archive/v2.1.1.zip
unzip v2.1.1.zip

Clone with Git

Clone the project from GitHub and checkout the release:

git clone https://github.com/youtube/spfjs.git
cd spfjs
git checkout v2.1.1

Get Started

After you've grabbed the code, get started.
